challenge.name: calculator
challenge.desc: Test and implement a simple command line based calculator.

tasks.name: Test multiplication
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that tests the multiplication method for two integers. 
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the product of those as an integer.

tasks.name: Test addition
tasks.desc:
Write a JUnit test case that test the addition method for two integers.
Method should take two integers as arguments and return the sum of those as an integer.
